parameters.name: AppId
parameters.description: The ID of the interactive messaging application whose user information you want to modify.

parameters.name: DataCenter
parameters.description: The data center. It must be the same as the data center that was specified when you called the [CreateLiveMessageApp](~~2593195~~) operation to create the interactive messaging application. Valid values: cn-shanghai and ap-southeast-1 (Singapore).

parameters.name: UserId
parameters.description: The ID of the user whose information you want to modify.

parameters.name: UserMetaInfo
parameters.description: The additional information about the user after the modification. The value can be up to 512 bytes in length.
